data.title: These are (pretty much) all the nicknames in NBA history
data.meta_description: Courtesy of the indispensable Basketball Reference, HoopsHype readers and our own efforts, we have put together a super long list of NBA nicknames throughout league history. If you think there's any nickname missing from NBA players past or present, please contact us at hoopshype@hoopshype.com.
data.text:
Courtesy of the indispensable Basketball Reference, HoopsHype readers and our own efforts, we have put together a super long list of NBA nicknames throughout league history.

If you think there’s any nickname missing from NBA players past or present, please contact us at hoopshype@hoopshype.com.

Here’s what we have in alphabetical order:

A

A.D. (Adrian Dantley)

A.I. (Allen Iverson)

Ace (Ariel Maughan, Leo Gottlieb)

Ack-Ack (Tom Heinsohn)

Action (Demetrius Jackson, Mark Jackson, Phil Jackson)

AD (Anthony Davis)

Agent Block (Hassan Whiteside)

Agent Zero (Gilbert Arenas)

AI2 (Andre Iguodala)

Air Canada (Vince Carter)

Air Congo (Serge Ibaka)
